column2: The most common of the governmentals forms Nuans are apart of. It is a strict class hierarchy consisting of Comtes, Aearles and Kings who rule over serfs. There is a large merchant class common in the Nuan fiefdoms however, feeding large amounts of money into the coffers of the land owners.
Leshnik Pillagers care not for land or technology. Rather this government lives to pillage and destroy. Strength is at their core, the weak do not survive and the strong thrive.
